title: 3DTILES_metadata 3D Tiles extension
description: 3D Tiles extension that defines metadata for a tileset.

schema.description: An object defining classes and enums.

schemaUri.description: A uri to an external schema file.

statistics.description: An object containing statistics about entities.

groups.description: A dictionary, where each key is a group ID and each value is an object defining the group.

tileset.description: An object containing metadata about the tileset.
